## Scene 1
Scene 1: Gathering Storm
Narrative Context: The story begins with the introduction of the main characters and setting, showcasing the initial situation before the war. This scene serves to establish the pre-war atmosphere and introduce key figures.
Visual Description: A wide shot of Europe, with Germany, Italy, and Japan prominent on the map. Hitler, Mussolini, and Hirohito are shown in separate frames, looking determined. The camera zooms out to reveal a darkening sky, symbolizing the impending war. The mood is tense, with a color palette of greys and blacks.
Style Notes: western comic style with bold lines and dramatic shading.
Continuity: This scene connects to the next by introducing the main antagonists and setting the stage for the war.

## Scene 2
Scene 2: Invasion of Poland
Narrative Context: The story progresses with the invasion of Poland, marking the beginning of World War II. This scene serves to show the initial conflict and introduce the Allied powers.
Visual Description: A dramatic shot of German tanks rolling into Poland, with soldiers marching behind. The Polish army is shown fighting back, but outnumbered. The camera angle is low, looking up at the tanks, emphasizing their power. The mood is chaotic, with a warm color palette to represent the intensity of battle.
Style Notes: western comic style with dynamic action sequences and expressive character designs.
